ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(4) > main:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h2

html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(3) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > footer > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(10) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(10) > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(10) > div > div > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > h4:nth-child(1)
